title: Razor Didot
content:
Does anyone know this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203229im_/http:/typophile.com/files/razortype_6287.png)

author: ahide

comments.content: isn’t this an old FUSE thing?

good call, i checked out this url [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113203229/http:/www.fontshop.de/fuse95/fuse-lab/lab-fonts/lab-fonts14.html) and found one called SKELETON although im not sure if it is or not.
Nope — tail of the R is quite different.
